text: Loncopué Aeroclub Airport is an airport serving the town of Loncopué in the Neuquén Province of Argentina. The airport is southwest of the town. There is a shallow ravine south alongside the runway. ==See also== * * *Transport in Argentina *List of airports in Argentina ==References== ==External links== *OpenStreetMap - Loncopué *OurAirports - Loncopué Airport *WorldAeroData - Loncopue Airport * Category:Airports in Argentina
title: Loncopué Airport
